name: Ambient
description: Emphasizes texture and tone over traditional musical structure, aimed at evoking a particular atmosphere or mood.

sub_genres.name: Ambient Americana
sub_genres.description: Made using traditional Americana and Country instrumentation, typically to evoke a pastoral atmosphere.

sub_genres.name: Dark Ambient
sub_genres.description: Emphasizes an ominous, gloomy, and dissonant atmosphere.

sub_genres.name: Space Ambient
sub_genres.description: Flowing and relaxing synthesizer-based music derived from Progressive Electronic, often oriented around imagery of outer space.

sub_genres.name: Tribal Ambient
sub_genres.description: Combines the theory and atmosphere of Ambient with traditional instruments and sounds from around the globe.
